content:
I will subsequently classify and categorize all collected organisms,
provide them with appropriate care and management,
and ensure they maintain optimal vitality.

content:
I've carefully observed the intertidal zone around us...
Ah, that's the rocky shore and beach area by the sea,
Based on my experience, we're certain to collect more new specimens here.

content: Each shore-dweller has its own behavior, so you'll need to use the <color=#38b6c5>left mouse button</color> flexibly and keep an eye on the distance to your target.

the Academia unanimously agreed that the ecosystem 
along <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color> holds significant value 
for studying the growth cycles of world bubbles!

including the ecological specimens you've already added to the eco-sphere,
you only need to collect <color=#8AAB4B>5</color> more new species to complete the set!

Whether it's discovering new marine organisms,
catching new fish, or capturing new insects—
you can bring them all to me!

content: In the shallow beach area, aim at the creature, <color=#38b6c5>hold</color> the <color=#38b6c5>left</color> mouse button, slowly approach it, and release the button to catch it quickly.

content:
Fishing and bug catching alone have their limitations in terms of biodiversity...
Here's an essential tool for intertidal specimen collection:
The <color=#8AAB4B>shellfish tongs</color> DIY Card.
Please accept it!
